law.catch_line: A retail pet store that sells dogs shall:...

text.section: A retail pet store shall maintain a copy of the records required under subsection (a)(2) of this section for at least 1 year after the date of sale of the dog.

A retail pet store shall make the records required under subsection (a)(2) of this section available to:
the Division of Consumer Protection of the Office of the Attorney General on reasonable notice;
any bona fide prospective purchaser on request; and
the purchaser at the time of a sale.
